articles.author: Siobhan Marin
articles.title: Why American '80s televangelist Tammy Faye is admired by queer Australians today - ABC News
articles.description: With one interview, televangelist Tammy Faye Bakker sent shockwaves through evangelical Christian circles. Decades on, it's still impacting queer Australians.
articles.content:
In 1985, American televangelist Tammy Faye Bakker had a man called Steve Pieters on her show.
Pieters was undergoing chemotherapy at the time, so they were connected via satellite  but their connect… [+5815 chars]

articles.title: Tequila could overtake vodka as America's favorite liquor as sales boom - CNBC
articles.description: Tequila and mezcal was the second-fastest growing spirits category in 2021, according to the Distilled Spirits Council of the U.S.
articles.content:
Tequila could soon overtake vodka as America's favorite liquor, fueled by consumers' desire for pricey bottles of agave-based spirits.

articles.title: U.S. restores sanctions waiver to Iran with nuclear talks in final phase - Reuters
articles.description: President Joe Biden's administration on Friday restored sanctions waivers to Iran to allow international nuclear cooperation projects, as indirect American-Iranian talks on reviving the 2015 international nuclear deal with Tehran enter the final stretch.

articles.author: 自由時報
articles.title: 美眾院通過抗衡中國法案 包含台灣代表處正名 - 自由時報電子報
articles.description: 美國眾議院今日以222張同意票，通過「2022年美國競爭法」（America COMPETES Act of 2022），該法案除了強化美方競爭力以抗衡中國，也包含呼籲美國國務卿展開尋求協商，將我駐美代表處正式改名為「台灣駐美代表處 （Taiwan Representative Office in the United States）」。綜合外媒報導，全名為「2022年美國創造製造業機會和技術卓越與經濟實力法」法案（America Creating Opportunities for Manufacturing,…
